Question: A bad rep spreads like wildfire. If I were you, I'd quit all this nonsense. What's the point?
Answer3: I don't know any other way.

Question: After all, isn't it not pitiable when one denies one's own feelings?
After confronting me like this... Are you that kind of human too?
Ah, it's a shame. If I'd taken this seriously from the start, I wouldn't be in this sorry state.
Ain't people your age suppose'ta be out on dates and stuff instead?
And if that's the case, why don't you just stop this futile endeavor? It's meaningless...
Are all the kids these days doin' stuff like this?
Answer2: No, I thought this up myself.

Question: Are you bored?
Are you fighting to help or protect the world or something?
As far as you're concerned, what kind of person was I to you?
...But be-hee-fore all that, let's enjoy a little chat, ho!
But before you do, do something funny. What can you do?
But is it fair to my kind if only I find such happiness, leaving them all behind?
But I've been around the block, so I know--there's something else you want from me, isn't there?
Answer3: I just want you to die happy.

Question: But I've got a catch phrase that I'm famous for.
But this way of life in this world is all I've ever known.
Answer2: There are other ways to live.

Question: But what if I ripped your body apart? ...What color blood would come pouring out?
Can you sacrifice yourself in order to demonstrate your adoration of our Father?
Can you sacrifice yourself in order to demonstrate your veneration of our Father?
Care to explain yourself? I certainly hope you have a good reason for this boorish treatment.
C'mon, what's with the mask? Kinda cringy, don'tcha think?
Confess your sins.
Could this be what humans call a proposal...?
Couldn't ya at least make me a cup of tea or somethin'? Hell, that'd be real polite.
Answer3: I'm not known for being polite.

Question: Did I just see your hand shaking? Isn't your guilt tormenting you?
Did I... lose?
Didn't you feel like that when you were a kid, too?
Do you have a dish you're good at?
Do you have a lot of friends? Ever feel like the things they do are annoying?
Do you know what I speak of?
Do you seek friendly competition with a beloved neighbor? Or have you come to destroy a hated foe?
Do you...think of me as a charlatan?
Answer2: I think of you as a foe.

Question: Do you think they really mean it all the time?
Answer2: No, but they say it anyway.

Question: Doesn't what you're doing bother your conscience?
Don't take this the wrong way, but man... Bein' a carefree kid sure must be nice.
Answer1: I want to be a kid forever.
Answer3: I wish I was still a baby.

Question: Don't you think expecting your would-be victim to be receptive to your words is unreasonable?
Don't you think it's sad that slang and sayings can grow old and get outdated?
For you to force me to prostrate myself, as one who only seeks your well-being... Is there anything more irrational?
Guess what I want you to read me before you tuck me into bed!
Had I known things would turn out like this, I'd wish I had found the courage to ask that girl out...
Have you made an appointment, ho?
Answer3: Just tell me what you know.

Question: ...Heed my words. I am not the one you should detest.
Answer3: I'll be the judge of that.

Question: Hell, I got all sortsa girls lined up if you're into that.
Hey. Aren't you hungry? Can we take a break and go eat somewhere?
Hey, how about this? If you don't shoot me, then I'll kiss you. Not a bad deal, right?
Hey, if I don't die here, what do you think I'll be like in the future?
Hey, if ya got any medicine, lend me some. One of them painkillers...
Hey, if you got any medicine, lend me some. They're supposed ta work miracles, right...?
Hey, is my hair flat? Does it look weird?
Hey, let's play a game! Guess what I wanna eat!
Hey, mister, will you give me a yummy snack to eat?
Hey. So whaddya feel when you think about the future?
Hey, sonny if somethin's been botherin' you. I'm willin' ta give you a listen.
...Hey, there's no need for all this, right? Let's drop the drama and just go get something to eat. The thought has crossed your mind, hasn't it? Come on, where would you take me?
Answer3: Where would you like to go?

Question: Hey. Why aren't ya at school?
Honestly, aren't I, like, a way better girl than those idols?
How about we live together? What kind of place do you want to live in?
How 'bout we have an interview? You're the winner, after all. I'll listen to whatever you gotta say.
How 'bout you, sonny? What kinda trip do you wanna take?
How 'bout you? You wanna get married someday?
How can you do such terrible things to a cute hee-ho like me!?
How did I lose to you? I mean... I win when it comes to looks, ho.
How did you find out about me, ho?
Humans always want either an autograph or a self-hee, ho. Which is it, ho?
Humans talk over drinks, right? How 'bout it? Hell, let me buy ya a round, sonny.
I also have loved ones who would miss me. You do catch my meaning, yes?
I can't sadden my fans, ho. ...You catch my drift, don't you?
I coulda been a star...
I don't hate you. No, I don't feel that way at all...
I fear neither death, nor you.
...I gotta ask. How do you work out?
Answer2: I just have a knack for it.

Question: I guess women are really more social these days, finding so many fun things to do outside the home.
I insist you surrender yourself to the authorities.
I know when I'm gettin' all sweaty. I'm glistenin', ain't I?
I lost. Here I lay, at your feet, at your mercy. Just what do you want from me?
I mean, how does it feel to wave your gun at an enemy who's completely lost the will to fight?
I need to recover, ho. Don't you feel that way too?
I occasionally wish to pamper myself as a reward for working hard. How would you do that?
I suppose it makes no difference if you kill me or if I die just a little bit later, dearie.
Answer3: That's still a long ways off

Question: I suppose that's why I feel so confused, child. After all, why am I being treated like this?
I suppose this "real world" where you come from must be fairly boring.
I think dying alone isn't so bad, dearie, but isn't living alone in the first place the real tragedy?
I think the way you're treating me is "overfamiliar." I think...
I wanted to go on vacation, too, before all this happened...
I was going to catch a great buy, live a life of celebrity... Where'd it all go wrong?
I wish I could see what kind of parents raised you to run loose and wreak havoc like this.
Answer1: I'll introduce you to them later.
Answer3: Leave my parents out of this.

Question: I wish they would leave us old people alone. After all, it's not like we have much time left.
I wonder how things might have been between us if cicumstances were different somehow.
I wonder how things might have been between us if circumstances had been different somehow?
I wonder if it's about time I quit this job.
I wonder if us speaking together like this now means that we are somehow connected...
I would have never accepted this task if I knew it would involve this sort of suffering.
If so, then won't you overlook this? Let's make a deal...
If that's the plan, well, you better make sure I'm satisfied.
If that's true, then I don't think there's any real point in killing me...
If yer gonna kill me, do me a solid and make it quick.
Answer2: I'll have some more fun first.

Question: If you ask me, it's a lot more fun ta go chasin' after younger ladies, but...
If you capture me, what you going to do to me?
Answer2: Use you to decorate the hall

Question: If your girlfriend asked if you wanted to have dinner with "everybody", what you you say?
If your girlfriend asked if you were free to have dinner with her "friends", what would you say?
If your parents could see you now, I'm sure it would break their hearts...
I'll go out with you just for today if there are no strings attached.
Answer3: I've got enough on my plate...

Question: I'm a super popular Shadow, you hee-know. My fans won't just sit around and take this, ho.
I'm busy, ho. It's tough being so popular.
I'm inclined to turn you down, but if you still wish to speak, I will perhaps consider it.
I'm just putting this out there, but you wouldn't treat me this way if I were younger, right? ...It's true, isn't it?
Answer3: Cougars are all the rage now.

Question: ...I'm not going to go easy on you for doing something like this, you know...
I'm not the one you should want to shoot...
I'm sure a miracle's gonna happen to me, right?
Answer2: I'd be jealous if it did.

Question: I'm sure there're other people in the world who'd irritate you more. C'mon, tell me.
Answer1: Older people trying to look young.

Question: I'm thinking that maybe I should act more grandmotherly. How can I go ahead and do that for you?
Answer3: You don't have to do anything.

Question: I'm tired of being a kid. Didn't you feel that way when you were little, too?
Answer3: I want to be a kid forever.

Question: I'm well-connected, okay? I know some people that are pretty complicated.
In the end, killin' me's just a waste of yer time and energy. You get what I'm sayin', right?
Answer1: When you put it that way...

Question: Is it because I'm not acting mature enough? Like, what the heck makes someone mature, anyway?
Is it 'cause I wasn't a "good kid"?
Answer3: It has nothing to do with this.

Question: Is it just me, or does something stink?
Is it not a breeding ground for impudent humans? How do you view this world of yours?
Is it not possible for this series of events involving you and me to be attributed to that?
Is it okay if I get mad right now?
Is it only for men? Where did you get it?
Is it scary to get a shot? Does it make you cry, mister?
Is there a reason why I just can't beat you?
Is there really any benefit for me if I joined with you?
Isn't that just like when a human woman gets married and moves in with her husband?
Isn't that kinda... outdated thinking?
Isn't that kinda... outdated thinking?
It's bad to talk to yourself.
It's fine to cry sometimes.
Answer3: Are you trying to comfort me?

Question: It's kind of chilly, isn't it?
I've... always wanted to say this, but... I think you are a pretty decent person.
Answer1: Are you trying to flatter me?

Question: ...Just what the hell are you? A monster? A human? Are you a boy? A girl?
Just what's your purpose in doing all of this? Is it for money, or just to have fun?
Listen, do you like people that are into older guys?
Looking at you, you seem a little stiff. Are you constipated?
Maybe if I just kept my mouth shut, you wouldn't be doing this to me.
My heart is pounding. It feels like it's going to pop right out of my chest...
Nothin' like a bad day to get ya up and fightin', ho.
Now that I'm looking at you, you're not half bad. I'll make you into a star! What do you say?!
Now that you're an adult, what do you think is a good way to kill time?
Now you know how I feel, being put in such a horrible position. The world isn't fair, is it?
...Oh, don't tell me... You are a male, correct?
Oh, I'm just playing around, ho. What's wrong? You don't have a sense of humor, ho?
Please, I ask for your assistance. Lend me your strength.
Please, just let me go. I won't ever do anything bad again.
Power is intoxicating, is it not? How does it feel to be in a position to kill me?
...Right? So you understand my pain, don't you?
Seems like the young folk these days can get ahold of anything just by searching for it online.
Since it seems you have a moment, perhaps you will entertain me by answering a question or two?
So, how does it feel to live a life full of lies?
Answer3: How is my life a lie?

Question: So, how do I look, ho? Just as cool as always, right?
So, you're the one that's been making a fuss? C'mon now, don't get so upset...
Answer3: You're the one making the fuss.

Question: Some people get happy when they're told they're cute, don't they?
Someone's a little sad, huh?
Answer2: I just want to be left alone.

Question: Tell me, how did you get so strong? Are you using some kinda cheats?
Tell me, what is something you're good at?
That's not very nice. I have feelings, you know!
The things that happened in the past, the things that will happen in the future... Do you feel nothing towards any of it?
There must have been something that made you stronger... Just what was it?
This is kind of... weird, isn't it? For us to be doing this...
This isn't what I imagined. I thought my life would be better.
This is supposed to be the final boss, but I'm just a kid... What's with this reality?
This just means that the two of us... The two of us have been bound by destiny, ho!
Those who would defy me... Are you all as rude as you are?
Answer2: What are you going to do about it?

Question: Tsk, you're so stubborn. How about we just have a little fun instead?
Answer3: What do you have in mind?

Question: What do I do...? I can't think of anything! I'm drawing a blank here!
What do you do with your spare time?
What do you do when you don't feel like doing anything at all?
What do you think is a good way to get through a long, boring lecture?
What do you think of me?
What do you think of people who take public transportation?
What do you think you're doing? Why don't you have a good answer for me?
What makes you so different from everyone else? Tell me. I'll even listen to your long, boring story.
Answer2: I don't have to tell you.

Question: What will you do with me now?
Answer1: I'll keep you as a pet.

Question: What're you gonna do after this is all over? You got a party planned or somethin'?
Answer3: I have to go to work.

Question: What's it like to live with so many people? All the noise and crowds... doesn't it bother you?
Answer1: I don't know any other way.

Question: What's the right way to live your life, then? Tell me, since you're so enlightened.
What's with the scary face? It's not cute at all! Are you upset, mister?
What's with the way you're talkin'? Are you from out of town or somethin'?
Answer1: It's just the way I talk.

Question: When you look in the mirror, what do you see?
Why do you look so lonely? Is it because you were cast out?
Why do you look so lost? Is it because you are burdened by what you've done?
Why don't you talk to me? Aren't you going to tell me a secret or two?
Why is it that you can kill so easily? Are you that far from being human?
You have a look about you... Did you come from a big family?
You know... It's not a crime to be weak.
You know... If you took it easy, you might just get some sleep.
You know what? I'm gonna ask you a simple question.
You may not like it, but what are you?
You have no hobbies or anything? It's all just fighting?
You wanna come with me on my next big journey, ho?
You're right... How could I not realize this?! This world is meaningless!
Answer2: I've been trying to tell you that.

Question: You're lucky it was just me. You can't do anything like this in the real world, right?
You're showing off your strength to me, aren't you? I total-hee read your mind, ho.
You're s'posed to go easy on kids! Are you stupid? Do you go to school and get stupid grades?
